ExportItemConfig.Query:
SELECT c.id, SELECT b.coupon_id ,m.* FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id LEFT JOIN pm_coupon_bind b ON b.member_id = m.id WHERE r.reg_partner_id = {partnerId}
lv.name as limit_levelName FROM pm_coupon c LEFT JOIN conf_member_level lv ON c.min_level = lv.id WHERE c.partner_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%' ORDER BY c.update_time DESC,c.create_time desc LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pm_coupon WHERE partner_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%'
